newsitem.title: COLOMBIA: Colombian domino players die in drive-by shooting.
newsitem.headline: Colombian domino players die in drive-by shooting.

text.p: Drive-by gunmen opened fire on players having a sidewalk game of dominoes on Sunday, killing two people and injuring five, in the Caribbean coastal city of Barranquilla, Colombian radio said.
Police said the unidentified assassins were travelling in cars and on high-powered motorcycles when they fired indiscriminately at the group of domino players.
There was no immediate indication of what motivated the attack, RCN radio said. It did not appear to be linked to a recent wave of guerrilla and right-wing paramilitary violence.
